title: Difference when building VS project in VS and msbuild
body:
I have a solution contains a,b,c 3 projects. c is rely on b and a. b is rely on a.  
I have set a,b properties copy local false.  
I start to rebuild c in vs ,result is exact what i want.  
but when i build with msbuild command, like this:  
_`msbuild c.csproj /target:Rebuild /nologo /property:Configuration=Release;OutDir="output" /clp:NoSummary /verbosity:minimal`_ 
In OutDir , a,b comes . it's strange.
